name: Word Gram - Free Word Search Game
name_original: Word Gram - Free Word Search Game
description:
Word Gram is a brand new highscores word search game with 4 game modes and thousands of words to be found! Can you make it into TOP20?

How to play: Tap on letters to create a word! Create as many words as you can before the top of the board is reached! Each word must consist of at least 3 characters! Longer words give you better score! If you are out of letters, you can add new ones by pressing "+" button in the top left corner!

Game Modes:
Challenge - 1 new letters is added to each used column + into 2 random columns
Quick - Each found word will add new letters into every column
Attack - New letters are added periodically into each column
48 Letters - You have only 48 letters! Get the best score possible and submit it via Menu button!

Features
* 4 game modes
* over 150K words
* change colors
* global leaderboard included - you play against people all around the world!
* review your words at the end of the game
* setup your own settings - turn on/off explosion effect, show/hide points on the letters
* great fun for the whole family
* 100% free full version with no In-App purchases
